description:
What could be better than fried dough?  How about fried dough turned into a pizza?  

I first saw fried pizza being made on 'Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives.'  Eventually, I started researching into it and the 'pizza fritta' is actually a pretty popular street food in Italy.  Canâ€™t imagine why?
title: Fried Dough Pizza
